title: 37 Chef-Quality CBD Infusions Connect Cannabis to the Foodservice Industry
description: On this episode of The Barron Report, Paul Barron speaks with CEO, Kim Sanchez Rael and Chief Creative Officer, Ron Silver of Azuca,  on how their company’s unique technology is developing the latest CBD Trends.
